katies crossing

Episode 1 Episode 2 Episode 3 Episode 4 Episode 5

Katies Crossing is a five part queer mystery series revolving around two Katies who find each other, like each other, and mysteriously transform each other. One Katie is an investigative journalist hot on the trail of a conspiracy involving a hot dog company, trash, and rivers. The other Katie is a dog walker turned newly famous YA fiction ebook author. They must try to remain themselves as they unravel the mystery of whatâ€™s on the other side of the crossing.

Written by Sally Lawton, Max Wirt, Katy Albert, and Katie Williams. Directed by Sally Lawton and Max Wirt.
